person_credits.name: Garry Trudeau
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight has all the action, humor, and adventure of the other great Lodoss manga series, and features the new adventures of Parn and the beloved elf Deedlit, along with such wonderful new characters as Spark, the young knight-in-training. Spark dreams of being a glorious hero in the wars of Lodoss, but he fails in guarding the magical crystal, whose mysterious powers have fallen into the hands of the forces of evil. Will he be able to overcome the shame of his failure, and retrieve this great treasure? This new series has glorious, action- packed art by Masato Natsumo that Lodoss fans will love!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight
Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: This all-new Lodoss series from Ryo Mizuno, the creator of the world of Lodoss and of the Grey Witch and Lady of Pharis comics and graphic novels features Spark, the young knight-in-training who dreams of being a glorious hero, but must retrieve the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by Dark Elves in the service of the evil Vagnado, the sorcerer of Marmo, from under his very nose. In this episode, Spark and the new heroes who will help him retrieve the Crystal Ball, have crossed the burning desert sands to the South Fort where they meet the beautiful leather-clad adventuress Laina, and nearly die when the fort is attacked by a powerful, Hydra-headed creature! This new series has glorious, action-packed art by Masato Natsumoto that Lodoss fans will love!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: The leather-clad adventuress Laina has lost her partner, Randy, to an incredible beast that is attacking the South Fort, where the new Lodoss heroes are staying. Shades of Alien, Randy has been partially absorbed by the creature! These new heroes are led by the young apprentice knight, Spark, on a quest to retrieve the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by Dark Elves in the service of the evil sorcerer Vagnado. When Spark faces this creature, he finds Randy's face and body confronting him on the battlefield! He has no choice ? Randy must die to save the Fort and Spark's companions. In the aftermath of the battle, the lovely whip-wielding Laina, now alone, asks to join their quest. And Spark finds himself filled with conflicting emotions, as he is drawn to her beauty.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: The evil sorcerer Vagnado has stolen the Crystal Ball of Souls, and now he is plotting with Marmo to capture all of Lodoss! Spark, the Heroic Knight, is leading a quarreling group of heroes to reclaim this occult treasure, and they arrive at Hilt, where they learn that the governor and King Kashu are preparing for the final battle with Marmo. The powerful fighter Gallac wants to abandon the search and join the fight, and Spark has to hold his group together to continue their quest, encouraged by Parn. And what strange secret about Spark's future does Parn hold?

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: The beautiful, leather-clad adventuress Laina is in mortal danger in this exciting new Lodoss series. Spark, the Heroic Knight, is leading a group of heroes to reclaim the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by the evil sorcerer Vagnado. When they arrive at Hilt, where they learn that the governor and King Kashu are preparing for the final battle with Marmo. The heroes set out from to continue their quest, and it is all Spark can do to hold the quarreling group together... until a Dark Elf attacks, and stabs Laina in the chest!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Spark, the heroic knight, is leading a group of heroes to reclaim the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by the evil sorcerer Vagnado. Spark has assembled fighters and magicians, including, Laina, the adventuress, the fighter Gallac, and Father Greevas. Now joined by the beautiful and mysterious Neece, it is all Spark can do to hold the quarreling group together... until a Dark Elf attack! Laina is grievously wounded, and she and Gallac battle bravely against the dark and evil Elf warriors!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: The dark elves have attacked Spark, the Heroic Knight, and the group of heroes he is leading to reclaim the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by the evil sorcerer Vagnado. Laina, the beautiful leather-clad adventuress, leads the brave band into battle. It's non-stop action as swords cross, arrows fly, and good and evil spells meet when the magicians and heroes and villains of Lodoss meet on their rocky battleground. Laina and Gallec are grievously wounded, and only the intervention of Neece, the elf, can save Spark from certain death! Lodoss is one of the great anime series of all time, and writer Ryo Mizuno, the creator of the world of Lodoss, and artist Masato Natsumoto bring us another action- packed series that Lodoss fans will love!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: After a dangerous band of Dark Elves have attacked Spark, the Heroic Knight, and the group of brave warriors he is leading to reclaim the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by the evil sorcerer Vagnado, the heroes stop to dress their wounds. Laina, the beautiful leather-clad adventuress, has been grievously wounded, and the lovely Neece, the Elf, uses all her magical skill to save her life! Lodoss is a huge international anime hit, loved by fans everywhere, and writer Ryo Mizuno has created an exciting new series with wonderful complex characters, plus action-packed art by Masato Natsumoto!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Lodoss is the cursed and haunted isle where elves, dwarves, priests, and hero knights fight the forces of evil to keep the kingdoms of Lodoss free and at peace. The Heroic Knight of this series is the brave but inexperienced Spark leading a group of brave warriors to reclaim the Crystal Ball of Souls, stolen by the evil sorcerer Vagnado. After an attack by Dark Elves (who also carried out the theft), Laina, the beautiful leather-clad adventuress, has been grievously wounded, and the lovely Neece, the Elf, uses all her magical skill to save her life! Lodoss is a huge international anime hit, loved by fans everywhere, and writer Ryo Mizuno has created an exciting new series with wonderful complex characters, plus action-packed art by Masato Natsumoto!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Arriving at last in the beautiful city of Roid, the pilgrims from Flaim believe that their mission is nearly completed, as they will soon meet with King Etoh. But it turns out that Marmo is menacing Roid, and its skeletal warriors are attacking the city's Pharis monastery under the leadership of a Dark Elf!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight
Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: A Dark Elf has taken over the beautiful city of Roid. Instead of this being the end of the quest of the brave band led by Spark, it is a new conflict. Their mission to recover the Crystal Ball of Souls must wait, as King Etoh needs their help. Marmo is menacing Roid, and its skeletal warriors are attacking the city's Pharis monastery. The band of heroes fight their way into the monastery, and lead the beautiful and magical Neece into the inner-sanctum, where they confront the Dark Elf!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: It's an all-action issue of Heroic Knight as Spark and his band of heroes face the Dark Elf who has taken over the beautiful city of Roid. Instead of the end of the quest of the brave band led by Spark, it is a new conflict. Their mission to recover the Crystal Ball of Souls must wait because Roid and King Etoh need their help. The Dark Elf has led a band of skeletal warriors in taking over the city's Pharis monastery and together with the beautiful and magical Neece they face the Elf in the sacred inner sanctum. One by one, the beautiful Laina, Gallac the Warrior, and Lief the Dark Elf! Chronicle of the Heroic Knight is another fabulous story in the ongoing series of Lodoss sagas, an exciting and character-driven story that's filled with action and surprises.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Spark and his band of heroes face the Dark Elf who has taken over the beautiful city of Roid. In a fierce battle in the bowels of the Palace, one by one the band of heroes face the magical and martial prowess of this dark spiritual being. Spark uses all of his skill as a swordsman, Leyli attacks him with her powerful whip, and it seems as though victory is theirs. Suddenly, the Dark Elf brings out a new weapon... he conjures up his own angel!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Spark and his band of heroes face the Dark Elf who has taken over the beautiful city of Roid. In a fierce battle in the bowels of the Palace, one by one the band of heroes face the magical and martial power of this dark spiritual being. Suddenly, the Dark Elf brings out a new weapon... he conjures up his own angel! The Guardian's magic is strong, and soon the brave fighter Gallac has fallen under its spell, and turns on his dear friends and companions! Spark and his companions are at the mercy of this winged being and its new human ally, their friend! Evil has never been so beautiful or worn such an angelic aspect as it does in this dangerous and magical battle in the world of Lodoss!Chronicle of the Heroic Knight is another fabulous story in the ongoing series of Lodoss sagas, an exciting and character-driven story that's filled with action and surprises.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description: Spark and his band of heroes face the Dark Elf who has taken over the beautiful city of Roid. In a fierce battle, the Dark Elf has brought out a new weapon... he conjures up his own angel! The Guardian's magic is strong, and soon the brave fighters are at the mercy of this winged being! And the city explodes in flames, as the battle rages and evil magic comes close to destroying Roid! And most tragic of all, Neece falls into the clutches of the Dark Elf!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description:
Sprak and the heroes of Lodoss have been distracted form their mission to deliver a letter to the kingdom of Roid. The brutal Dark Elf is trying to assemble the magical items necessary to resurrect Kardis, the goddess of destruction. Now Spark and his friends must defeat Jiba, but they never guessed that someone so young could wield so much power. Can the heroes prevent the destruction of Lodoss?

Collects Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight #13-17.
name: Book Three

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description:
The destructive forces of Marmo are on one side and the noble forces of Valis are on the other. Can Spark and his friends rescue Neece before the forces of evil use her to resurrect the Goddess of Destruction?

Collects Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight #24-29.
name: Book Five

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

description:
Record of Lodoss War is heroic fantasy at its finest, set in a timeless world of knights and elves, gods and witches, that has led to some of the most popular series of animated films and TV series, comics and graphic novels of all time. Chronicles of the Heroic Knight introduces Spark, the young knight-in-training who serves and waits for the day that his name will appear on the list of knights. Although he dreams of being a glorious hero in the wars of Lodoss, he fails in his first assignment from the king, guarding the powerful, magical Crystal Ball of Souls. It is stolen from under his very nose by Dark Elves in the service of the evil Vagnado, the sorceror of Marmo. The beloved Grey Witch characters Deedlit the Elf and Parn the Knight also return to guide and help Spark, but the focus of this series is the new heroes who join Spark in his quest to retrieve the Crystal Ball: Leif, the beautiful half-elf warrior, the brave Gallac, who is also known as the Blue Shooting Star, and the beautiful leather-clad adventuress Laina. This comic series is as exciting as the Heroic Knight anime series, but tells a very different story, richer and with deeper character development.

Collects Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight #1-5.
name: Book One

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight

person_credits.name: Bil Keane
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

volume.name: Boy Who Turned into an Engine

person_credits.name: Jim Davis
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: The Comic Book Digest gives you 80 pages of eight-page sample previews from 10 future comic titles from publishers like Image, Dreamwave, DBPro, and Arcana Studios... read it before you buy it! On the flip-side, join in the suspense as Agent Goodwin tracks down a serial killer in the exclusive issue #2 full-length release of Mike S. Miller's "Deal With The Devil." Articles and interviews from writers, publishers, and artists throughout the industry provide an inside look benefitting to both the avid collector and the casual comic hobbyist.
name: The Imaginaries
